# Calculating Runoff Volumes

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
```

```{r}
# source runoff rscript
source(here::here("src/storm_runoff.R"))
```

```{r}
# use sourced function

# create range for impervious frac values
imp_range <- seq(from = 0.6, to = 0.8, by = 0.01)

#run function & store
vol_values <- predict_runoff(imp_range, 182)

runoff_df <- data.frame(imp_range, vol_values)

```

```{r}
# plot
library(ggtext)
ggplot(data = runoff_df, aes(x = imp_range, y = vol_values)) +
  geom_line(color = "#49be25", linewidth = 0.9) +
  geom_point(color = "#2596be", size = 2.5) +
  labs(title = "Runoff Volume and Impervious Surface Cover",
       x = "I<sub>A</sub>",
       y = "Volume (ft<sup>3</sup>)") +
  theme_light() +
  theme(axis.title.x = element_markdown(),
        axis.title.y = element_markdown()) 
```

```{r}
ggsave(here::here("figs", "runoff_plot.png"), height = 6, width = 7)
```
